summary: Wow. I never block people. But getting super in to game of thrones and seeing anti posts in the sansa stark tag got me blocking...
body:
Wow. I never block people. But getting super in to game of thrones and seeing anti posts in the sansa stark tag got me blocking and it feels so good.

I need to do this more often.

Also… hey mutuals. This has recently become a sansa stark fan blog. Thanks for staying with me lol

summary: With every episode this season, I grow more and more sure that Sansa will be the Queen. Whether it’s the Iron Throne or a new...
body:
With every episode this season, I grow more and more sure that Sansa will be the Queen. Whether it’s the Iron Throne or a new one (most likely), Sansa will be on it.

I also believe that when she does ascend, she will move the seat of power and the Capital in Westeros from King’s Landing to Winterfell.

reblog.comment:

I also believe that when she does ascend, she will move the seat of power and the Capital in Westeros from King’s Landing to Winterfell.

I also believe that when she does ascend, she will move the seat of power and the Capital in Westeros from King’s Landing to Winterfell.

summary: In general I’ve seen so much more love for Sansa Stark than there ever was back in season one. It warms my heart to see people...
body: In general I’ve seen so much more love for Sansa Stark than there ever was back in season one. It warms my heart to see people realized their biases and realized she’s a cool as shit character. I see a lot of love for her on Tumblr and YouTube communities. I’ll pretend Reddit doesn’t exist because Reddit is the place where u see hate for absolutely everything and everyone. But every once in a while a post shows up in the tags that reminds me there’s this weird section of fandom that rejects Sansa simply because she has a part to play. They don’t accept that. They want her to be insignificant and for her to not matter. Why I have no idea. But I’m so judging y’all.

reblog.comment: In general I’ve seen so much more love for Sansa Stark than there ever was back in season one. It warms my heart to see people realized their biases and realized she’s a cool as shit character. I see a lot of love for her on Tumblr and YouTube communities. I’ll pretend Reddit doesn’t exist because Reddit is the place where u see hate for absolutely everything and everyone. But every once in a while a post shows up in the tags that reminds me there’s this weird section of fandom that rejects Sansa simply because she has a part to play. They don’t accept that. They want her to be insignificant and for her to not matter. Why I have no idea. But I’m so judging y’all.

trail.content_raw: In general I’ve seen so much more love for Sansa Stark than there ever was back in season one. It warms my heart to see people realized their biases and realized she’s a cool as shit character. I see a lot of love for her on Tumblr and YouTube communities. I’ll pretend Reddit doesn’t exist because Reddit is the place where u see hate for absolutely everything and everyone. But every once in a while a post shows up in the tags that reminds me there’s this weird section of fandom that rejects Sansa simply because she has a part to play. They don’t accept that. They want her to be insignificant and for her to not matter. Why I have no idea. But I’m so judging y’all.
trail.content: In general I’ve seen so much more love for Sansa Stark than there ever was back in season one. It warms my heart to see people realized their biases and realized she’s a cool as shit character. I see a lot of love for her on Tumblr and YouTube communities. I’ll pretend Reddit doesn’t exist because Reddit is the place where u see hate for absolutely everything and everyone. But every once in a while a post shows up in the tags that reminds me there’s this weird section of fandom that rejects Sansa simply because she has a part to play. They don’t accept that. They want her to be insignificant and for her to not matter. Why I have no idea. But I’m so judging y’all.

blog.name: queen--sansastark
blog.title: And no one knows
blog.description:
Tee | 26 | Canada | She/Her

Not a spoiler free blog for any fandom

I firmly believe in sharing love for what you love, so this is a hate-free blog

Becho Modern AU Series

question: top five sansa stark moments
answer:
QUEEN.  Imma do this in quotes because SHE IS THE BEST AT ONELINERS

  1. “You’re going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton”
  2. “I’m a slow learner, it’s true.  But I learn”
  3. “What about the North?”
  4. “Or maybe he’ll give me your head”
  5. “I will pray for your safe return, my lord, just as I pray for the King’s”

Honourable mention to “I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell.  This is my home, and you cannot frighten me.”

tags: lord and lady of the stormlands
summary: OMG!!!! GUYS!!! I CRACKED THE 500 LINE!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!!!!! Because everybody seems to like the litte happy family au...
caption:
OMG!!!! GUYS!!! I CRACKED THE 500 LINE!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!!!!!

Because everybody seems to like the litte happy family au of mine (especially with the inevitable doom coming tomorrow), i’ll gift you with a little present:

3 little stags and their heroes

Cat, the oldest, loves to train with Ser Brienne of Tarth and hopes to become a knight like her hero and her mom. She’s honorable and brave and as wild as her mother. 

Argella, after the Storm Queen, is a wild child full of wonder and excitement. She loves to sail with grandpa Davos. The sea and the storms are her home and she probably become a pirate (or a smuggler), if gendry and Arya don’t stop her. 

Little Jon is the quiet one, who loves storys and songs about heroes and love. He is a dreamer and a thinker, less a fighter like his sisters. Under Sansas protection and training, he’ll probably become a great politician, just the Queen of the North herself.

And Arya und Gendry just enjoy their rare free time together, while their friends watch over their three little terrors.

blog.description: Join us on our journey to help end extreme poverty by 2030. As a Global Citizen, you can learn about the issues, take action on what matters most to you and be part of a community committed to social change.

summary: "I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home. And you can't frighten me." Although she spent most of youth in dangerous...
caption:
“I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home. And you can’t frighten me.” Although she spent most of youth in dangerous foreign places where she was forced into child marriage and endured sexual assault, Sansa Stark finds the power within her to reclaim her home in Winterfell and protect her family. She’s just one of the many characters in “Game of Thrones” who set a strong example for female empowerment and leadership. See our full list of #GameOfThrones women who slay at this link.
⁣
(📷: Helen Sloan/HBO)

summary: tbh i love both dany and sansa and it really PAINS me that they don’t get along well, i mean you can make fun of their talk as...
body: tbh i love both dany and sansa and it really PAINS me that they don’t get along well, i mean you can make fun of their talk as much as you want but they really do have a lot in common. especially some bad experiences with men and the feeling of extreme loneliness and isolation. i really wish to see north independent by the end of the season and those two queens ruling their respective territories in harmony, cooperating with each other.

summary: “They are the only two people in this world that know know what the other endured, because they both were the victims of this...
caption: “They are the only two people in this world that know know what the other endured, because they both were the victims of this abuser - sexual victims, psychological victims, pretty much every way you can be victimized, he inflicted upon them. They both survived it. They’ve both come through it. They both have a very long way to go, but they know that they have each other.” - Bryan Cogman

summary: Pride and Prejudice - Chapter 1 - Secretsolstice - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Pride and Prejudice - Chapter 1 - Secretsolstice - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Haven’t updated this in a HOT minute, but boosting this fic up for y’all! Currently writing the next chapter listening to Jenny of Oldstones lol. Season 8 inspired me.


Chapters: 6/?
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Sansa Stark, Jon Snow, Robb Stark, Jon Snow | Aegon Targaryen, Ned Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark, Arya Stark, Brandon Stark, Joffrey Baratheon, Gilly (ASoIaF), Samuel Tarly, Rhaegar Targaryen, Rhaenys Targaryen, Jamie Lannister, Brienne of Tarth, minor Jamie and Brienne
Additional Tags: jonsa, Alternate Universe - Canon, Alternate Universe - Rhaegar Won
Summary:

Sansa Stark’s mother is keen on her two older children marrying. They go into King’s Landing as guests of King Rhaegar’s good faith in his estranged family to his son, Jon/Aegon Targaryen. The thing is, it seems as though Prince Jon Targaryen looks down on people who do not have wealth and mainly, are from the North. But she doesn’t care about Jon when she meets the charming and handsome Joffrey. With his light air about him and how he is not a brooding jerk like Jon, Sansa may think marriage isn’t so bad. Except Jon and Joffrey know and hate each other. Secrets unravel and Sansa has to check within herself before she may make the biggest mistake of her life.

Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Sansa Stark, Jon Snow, Robb Stark, Jon Snow | Aegon Targaryen, Ned Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark, Arya Stark, Brandon Stark, Joffrey Baratheon, Gilly (ASoIaF), Samuel Tarly, Rhaegar Targaryen, Rhaenys Targaryen, Jamie Lannister, Brienne of Tarth, minor Jamie and Brienne
Additional Tags: jonsa, Alternate Universe - Canon, Alternate Universe - Rhaegar Won
Summary:

Sansa Stark’s mother is keen on her two older children marrying. They go into King’s Landing as guests of King Rhaegar’s good faith in his estranged family to his son, Jon/Aegon Targaryen. The thing is, it seems as though Prince Jon Targaryen looks down on people who do not have wealth and mainly, are from the North. But she doesn’t care about Jon when she meets the charming and handsome Joffrey. With his light air about him and how he is not a brooding jerk like Jon, Sansa may think marriage isn’t so bad. Except Jon and Joffrey know and hate each other. Secrets unravel and Sansa has to check within herself before she may make the biggest mistake of her life.
trail.content:
Haven’t updated this in a HOT minute, but boosting this fic up for y’all! Currently writing the next chapter listening to Jenny of Oldstones lol. Season 8 inspired me.

blog.name: melis-ash
blog.title: Magic Mirror
blog.description: Elena. Russia. Feminist, ficwriter. 100% Eleanor Guthrie Team. Shameless Woodes Rogers fan. Now this blog is mainly about these two characters from Black Sails and their relationship, no sometimes I post something else. My English is bad, but if you want to ask me anything, I try to answer.

summary: black sails and game of throes for the ask meme :)
question: black sails and game of throes for the ask meme :)
answer:
Black Sails

Sorry for slow answering. It`s very predictable for people who know me long enough, so I tried to do it more expanded at least.

1.Favorite Male Character

Woodes Rogers. In stories about pirates and privateers I usually like these ones who were something else except these roles (like Dampier or Drake), so my simpathy is very predictable. I can`t say I really like his arc in season 4, it feels forced, something like showranners needs to make somebody villain for justifiing fandom faves ( and it`s without sense for me, because almost everyone in this show did a lot of shit), but Luke Roberts was amazing, so I was emotionally involved in Woodes story very much.

2.Favorite Female Character

Eleanor Guthrie. She was my fave since season one, and despite some other things changed, my love to Eleanor stays constant. There are very few characters in any other fandoms who were so important for me during my fandom life as Eleanor, I think she is my absolutely favorite character amongst all my faves now.. Amongs minor characters my faves Marion Guthrie (Eleanor`s Grandma) and Mrs Hudson.

3.Least Favorite Character

James Flint and Thomas Hamilton. Flint`s story is simbol of one of most toxic trop for me: justifying bad things that person does, because something hurts him before. There are many other aspects, I but this one is main.

4. Favorite Ship

Woodes/Eleanor. But honestly for me it was rather sort of threesome Woodes/Eleanor/Nassau. Since beginning this relationship was about Nassau, then became more and more personal (but still stayed about Nassau anyway). There are many paralles and nuances I like, but I think my favorite thing about them is that they both fight for civilization, but not really on good terms with it.

I never believed much in happy ending for them in show, but in my headcanon they leave New Providence, but several years later return in Nassau.

5. Favorite Friendship

Eleanor and Max in season 3 (lesser in 4). I have a mixed feelings about their dinamic, honestly, they are interesting, but also I dislike Max often blames Eleanor in things that other people did. But anyway I like to write about them in fics, and I find as friends they are more interesting than as romantic couple.

Also I always have soft spot for Rogers and Mrs Hudson, but I realize, it`s not friendship in common way. But they liked each other enough at least, so she is my BROTP with him.

6. Favorite Quote

Civilization has a number of faces. Because it`s about things I love in idea of civilization. Civilization is complicated thing with many aspects, bad and good and neither. Civilization is incredible gift, and civilization is a bitch eating her children. Civilization is worth fighting for, but sometimes collateral damage is awful. It`s endless paradox and we all live inside it.

7. Worst Character Death (if any)

For me it`s definitely was Eleanor. Not only because she is my fave, but it was written in stupid and forced way, like showranners wanted to kill her off anyway and were too lazy to make it well-written at least. Death of favorite character hurts almost always, but when it`s looks like bad movie it feels more worse.

8. This made me so happy you have no idea Moment

Almost all happy moments in that show very short, so remembering it is difficult. I definitely was very happy in 404, when Eleanor and Woodes looked at each other in spyglasses, but it was so short…

9. Saddest Moment

Shit. That scene in 406 with Rogers and dead Eleanor. Even now it demands efforts to write about it.

(I have another awful memory related with scene. Months or little more later final episode official Black Sails account on tumblr posted gif with that scene and there was negative comment about Woodes/Eleanor. I dont think anything they posts have a sense for interpretation show, BS advertising company always was very primitive and based on cheap manipulations, but WTF?  What`s wrong with these people? Do they think it`s funny or something? Am I only person who think there must be borders for advertising tricks?)

10. Favorite Location

Havana. I love Nassau, but Havana was visually perfect in every moment, even despite script was questionable.

Game of Thrones

I was huge fan of GRRM books before they became show, and I like first season but then I lost interest to this story. There was no new books long time, and I dont believe Martin will finish it, and show became worse and worse with every season. I watched 801 and my almost only emotion was boredom. Bad written, bad directed, waste of time.

1.Favorite Male Character

I have not favorite male character now. When I read books, I have faves, but I lost interest to them (Sandor, John) or their character development was disappointing (Jaimee) or something else.

2.Favorite Female Character

Sansa Stark. She was my fave since first book. It`s very unusual, when such female type gets POV in fantasy book (even in more mainstream book it`s rather rare thing), so it was very interesting and refreshing for me. She`s only reason why I still sometimes watch that show.

3.Least Favorite Character

Tirion.

4.Favorite Ship

Petyr/Sansa, I think. It`s strange sort of shipping, I never wished them happy ending in books or show (it was too much obvious, that storyline inevitable will end badly for Petyr), not that dark mentor/apprentice relationship is sort of kink for me, and I like to watch modern AU video with them.

In books I shipped Sandor/Sansa but in show accents were changed.

5. Favorite Friendship

Sorry, I dont remember.

6. Favorite Quote

I realized I even have not favorite quote in it anymore.

7.Worst Character Death (if any)

They kills characters off so often, I almost have no emotions about it. But Petyr`s death was definitely very stupid written.

8. This made me so happy you have no idea Moment

In books all Sandor/Sansa moments. In show… I`m not sure. Maybe when Sansa feed Ramsy to his dogs. And definitely short Luke Roberts role as Arthur Dayne.

9. Saddest Moment

I really don`t remember.

10. Favorite Location

Kings Landing.
